name: *** Read Modbus Settings
info:
Global Network Settings
IP: 169.254.119.60
Mask: 255.255.255.0
Global IP: 169.254.255.255

Control Network Settings
IP: 169.254.119.10
Mask: 255.255.255.0
Global IP: 169.254.119.1

Node Red Modbus TCP Settings
IP: 169.254.119.10
Port: 502
Unit: 1


**Make sure Control Network Settings IP and Node Red Modbus IP address match***
**Must have Static IP address for Modbus TCP/IP to work properly***
